contents: I don't think there is a flaw in the defense of the European and American countries, but the virus is also very much like an intelligent creature, it is constantly upgrading like a computer system, human beings are its host at most, killing its host is not their original purpose, but to help a virus to replicate and evolve over a long period of time, that's what's so scary about a virus, being a good virus, being very infectious, the ability to survive and reproduce with low lethality is the most natural attribute, which is also the trend.
